entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
